section.name: What is Hupa?
section.p: Hupa is an Rich IMAP-based Webmail application written in GWT (Google Web Toolkit).
Hupa has been entirely written in java to be coherent with the language used in the James project. And It has been a reference of a devloping using GWT good practices (MVP pattern and Unit testing)
Hupa is a functional and well designed email client, ready for reading, sending and managing messages, but it still lacks of many features email clients nowadays have.

section.name: Demo
section.p: There are two instances of Hupa running in the ASF infra. One is configured to use GMail IMAP and SMTP servers, so any gmail account should work. The other one uses a set of messages used to test Hupa with fake imap and smtp servers implementations.
